summary: No explicit requirements or acceptance criteria were provided in the BuildRequest. The diff shows substantial additions/changes across backend and frontend (templates, sharing route, subscription gating/UI, seed data), but with no stated requirements it's not possible to mark anything as missing. These changes are therefore treated as unrequested (hallucinated) relative to the empty spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Motoko canister expanded with user profiles, templates, bio pages, sharing IDs/state, and system templates.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, so implementing new backend domain models/state and template seeding is not grounded in requested work.

hallucinated_features.description: Large seeded template dataset added/expanded (130 influencer-style templates, 10+ per category).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified requesting seed template expansion.

hallucinated_features.description: New public share route and shared bio retrieval hook for unauthenticated bio sharing pages.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified requesting public sharing functionality or new routes/hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend UI/pages and logic changes around subscriptions/pricing/checkout and gating (view free, copy/customize gated), plus various enum comparison fixes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified requesting subscription gating changes or pricing/checkout fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/definition of 13 template categories constant for app-wide usage.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified requesting category taxonomy changes.
